publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1464.2 Nicola Sturgeon: Family Matters: Improving Family Law in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1464) in the name of Cathy Jamieson, insert at end "and ensures meaningful protection under the law, particularly in the event of separation or the death of one partner, for couples who have made the legitimate choice to live together without being married."
